whatIsTool.title: What is the IDO ROI Simulator?
whatIsTool.description: The IDO ROI Simulator is a free, privacy-focused tool that helps crypto investors understand the real return potential from token presale investments. It models your actual return timeline based on TGE percentage, cliff, vesting schedule, market direction, and FDV.
